pkgmetadata.longdescription: Download 'Qualtrics' Survey Data // Provides functions to access survey results directly into R using the 'Qualtrics' API. 'Qualtrics' https://www.qualtrics.com/about/ is an online survey and data collection software platform. See https://api.qualtrics.com/ for more information about the 'Qualtrics' API. This package is community-maintained and is not officially supported by 'Qualtrics'.
